name: UnnyWorld - Battle Royale
detailed_description:
UnnyWorld - is a place, where everything is possible.

Join Battle Royale matches. The rules are simple: huge Planet is the battleground, your goal is to survive at any cost. Collect spells, build towers and put traps to defeat other players. The Planet is always getting destroyed and to win in the Grand Battle you need to escape from collapsing territories.

Have you ever dreamed of owning a planet? Now you can get it! Evolve your planet as you want. Upgrade buildings, improve defense and hire monsters to protect the planet from other players. Or take your sword and use a magic ship to raid other planets.

Challenge other players and dive into the brand new MOBA World.
Control a hero in real-time during 3vs3 Arena battles! Your team is waiting for you! Create your guild and find allies. Become the best and lead your guild to victory.

short_description: Create your own world. Survive in Arenas and battlegrounds of Battle Royale. UnnyWorld is the first truly cross-platform fast paced online game!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Turkish, Spanish, Portuguese-Brazil, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: x86-compatible 800MHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible 3D graphics with at least 64MB of addressable memory (such as an ATI Radeon 7200, NVIDIA GeForce 2, or Intel GMA 950)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: x86-compatible 800MHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible 3D graphics with at least 64MB of addressable memory (such as an ATI Radeon 7200, NVIDIA GeForce 2, or Intel GMA 950)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Max OS X or later
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Max OS X or later
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
